return_max_min module¶

return_max_min.find_exceptions(number_list)¶

fxn checks and raises appropriate exceptions: type, value and import

Parameters:

number_list – list of integers
Raises:
  • TypeError – checks to make sure list is integers
  • ImportError – checks to make sure correct files are imported
  • ValueError – makes sure the integers have real values
return_max_min.find_min_max(number_list)¶

fxn takes list of integers and returns min and max in a tuple

Parameters:number_list – list of integers
Returns max_min:
 a tuple containing the max and min of a list
return_max_min.main(number_list)¶

fxn runs find min max, checks for exceptions and documents logging time stamps

Parameters:number_list – list of integers
Returns max_min:
 a tuple containing the max and min of number list
